Player History
Injured on 6/2/1965 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/7/1965 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/2/1967 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Released by Cleveland on 6/2/1971...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 3/1/1972 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/19/1972 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 6/23/1972 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/20/1972 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1975...
Traded from New York (A) to Los Angeles on 2/10/1975 (Going to NYY: 3B K. Bell. Going to LA: 2B D. Garcia)...
Injured on 5/30/1975 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/20/1975 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/17/1976 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 6/22/1979 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles to Houston on 1/31/1981 (Going to LA: 3B J. Mumphrey, 2B J. Orta, P J. Palmer. Going to HOU: P C. Speck, C G. Goossen, 2B D. Garcia, CF R. Craig)...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1981, off Mike Krukow (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/24/1981, off Terry Cox (PHI)...
Injured on 5/16/1983 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/14/1985 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/4/1986 with a Sore Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/3/1987 to a 3-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1987...
